QuestData.Title: The Defiler's Legacy
QuestData.Description: It seems you are not so easily deterred. Very well.$b$bYour deeds qualify you to seek the Sigil. To be clear, I am only permitting you to move on. This does not guarantee your success.$b$bThe greatest of your challenges lies before you.$b$bYou must go to the Praetorium and face Archimonde himself. Only by defeating the master of the Conservatory will you be worthy of the Sigil.$b$bFew have overcome this obstacle. I hope he does not make too much of a mess of you.
QuestData.PortraitGiverText: Archimonde did not know he would become the Defiler, but his pursuit of power did not start when Sargeras arrived.
QuestData.LogDescription: Defeat Archimonde and retrieve the Sigil of Awakening.
QuestData.CompletionText: Archimonde himself... what have we gotten ourselves into?
QuestData.RewardText: I have never felt power like this before...$b$b<Y'mera handles the shard cautiously.>$b$bWe should get this to Velen as soon as we can.
